message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would be perfect for your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $95. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market rate. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this counteroffer.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the product's value. To better align with your expectations while still ensuring a fair profit for me, I propose an adjusted price of $85 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests. I look forward to your consideration of this counteroffer.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $80. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this revised offer.
